data.text:
Marvelooous☆ Summer Training Camp is Marvelous, don't you think?★ 
Mister Sun seems happy! Seems like something good will happen!!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Marvelooous☆ Summer Training Camp is Marvelous, don't you think?★ 
<story>Mister Sun seems happy! Seems like something good will happen!!

data.text:
And with that in mind, we were doing well during 
this year's summer training camp. However――
data.processed:
<story>And with that in mind, we were doing well during 
<story>this year's summer training camp. However――

data.text:
Haa, training camp is fine but……out in the countryside, 
there aren't too many places to have fun, huh……
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Haa, training camp is fine but……out in the countryside, 
<story>there aren't too many places to have fun, huh……

data.text:
You said it~, I can't help but think……that it might 
be a bit more fun if there were some shops at least~.
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>You said it~, I can't help but think……that it might 
<story>be a bit more fun if there were some shops at least~.

data.text: Signal's weak too, so I'm really bored……
data.name: Uma Musume C
data.processed: <story>Signal's weak too, so I'm really bored……

data.text: Marvelous☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Marvelous☆

data.text:
There's Marvelous things all over the place, you know! 
Like, that beach house!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>There's Marvelous things all over the place, you know! 
<story>Like, that beach house!

data.text:
A tasty, salt-flavored yakisoba is good too, 
but the inner tubes you can borrow for free 
as a Tracen Academy student are what I'd recommend!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>A tasty, salt-flavored yakisoba is good too, 
<story>but the inner tubes you can borrow for free 
<story>as a Tracen Academy student are what I'd recommend!

data.text:
If it's now, then you might be able to see some tropical 
fish depending on the tides☆ Being able to just float 
around and find pretty fish is Marvelous too★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>If it's now, then you might be able to see some tropical 
<story>fish depending on the tides☆ Being able to just float 
<story>around and find pretty fish is Marvelous too★

data.text:
Oooh~, so there are tropical fish, huh~?! 
I kind of want to see them~!
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>Oooh~, so there are tropical fish, huh~?! 
<story>I kind of want to see them~!

data.text: And then, and then, if you walk a little bit――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>And then, and then, if you walk a little bit――

data.text: Seems like there's a really pretty stream!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Seems like there's a really pretty stream!

data.text:
Rumor has it, that this river has a king! 
If we were able to see it, it'd be very Marvelous!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Rumor has it, that this river has a king! 
<story>If we were able to see it, it'd be very Marvelous!

data.text:
A king!? If we got a picture of it, 
I bet it'd create quite a buzz!
data.name: Uma Musume C
data.processed:
<story>A king!? If we got a picture of it, 
<story>I bet it'd create quite a buzz!

data.text: See! Marvelous is everywhere all around us☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>See! Marvelous is everywhere all around us☆

data.text:
Oooh~, so there was all that nearby. I had no idea. During 
our next break, let's go take a look! Thanks, Marvelous-san!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Oooh~, so there was all that nearby. I had no idea. During 
<story>our next break, let's go take a look! Thanks, Marvelous-san!

data.text:
You're welcome! Rather than being bored, 
going and having fun is Marvelous after all☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>You're welcome! Rather than being bored, 
<story>going and having fun is Marvelous after all☆

data.text:
As usual, Marvelous Sunday's positive attitude 
was wonderful. It only took a moment to change 
the other students' outlook to a positive one.
data.processed:
<story>As usual, Marvelous Sunday's positive attitude 
<story>was wonderful. It only took a moment to change 
<story>the other students' outlook to a positive one.

data.text:
However, since we're at Summer Training Camp, I wonder if we 
could find something more special――no, Marvelous, to enjoy.

choices.text: ……I should try to find something too
……I should try to find something too

data.processed:
<story>However, since we're at Summer Training Camp, I wonder if we 
<story>could find something more special――no, Marvelous, to enjoy.

data.text:
Is something wrong? Your eyebrows are all scrunched up. 
Worried about something?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

choices.text: I'm fine. Nothing to worry about!

data.processed:
<story>Is something wrong? Your eyebrows are all scrunched up. 
<story>Worried about something?

data.text: I see☆ …………
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>I see☆ …………

data.text:
And so, to make the Summer Training Camp more Marvelous, 
I started searching for something fun nearby――
data.processed:
<story>And so, to make the Summer Training Camp more Marvelous, 
<story>I started searching for something fun nearby――

data.text:
I wandered every which way to ask questions and get information. 
I wanted those girls to have a Marvelous experience――
data.processed:
<story>I wandered every which way to ask questions and get information. 
<story>I wanted those girls to have a Marvelous experience――

data.text:
As if in response to that feeling, I had found 
something. A festival held once every 5 years 
in the next town. It was certain to be Marvelous!
data.processed:
<story>As if in response to that feeling, I had found 
<story>something. A festival held once every 5 years 
<story>in the next town. It was certain to be Marvelous!

data.text:
I was sure Marvelous Sunday and the others would 
be overjoyed! I needed to relay this information 
ASAP so we could make preparations to go!
data.processed:
<story>I was sure Marvelous Sunday and the others would 
<story>be overjoyed! I needed to relay this information 
<story>ASAP so we could make preparations to go!

data.text:
Waaiii~! Welcome back☆★☆ 
Everyone here's ready to go, Trainer!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Waaiii~! Welcome back☆★☆ 
<story>Everyone here's ready to go, Trainer!

data.text:
Oooooh~ Ahahahaha! 
So this is the Marvelous that Trainer made☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Oooooh~ Ahahahaha! 
<story>So this is the Marvelous that Trainer made☆

data.text:
Yep yep! I knew Trainer could do it! 
Because Trainer and me think alike, after all☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Yep yep! I knew Trainer could do it! 
<story>Because Trainer and me think alike, after all☆

data.text: That's why I had everyone start getting ready~!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>That's why I had everyone start getting ready~!

data.text:
Trainer is Marvelous so, for sure, you'd find something 
incredibly Marvelous, is what I told them☆★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Trainer is Marvelous so, for sure, you'd find something 
<story>incredibly Marvelous, is what I told them☆★

data.text: 『If I hadn't done that, what would you have done……?』
data.processed: <story>『If I hadn't done that, what would you have done……?』

data.text: 『If I hadn't done that, what would you have done……?』
data.processed: <story>『If I hadn't done that, what would you have done……?』

data.text:
I'm sure the old me would have asked something like that. 
But weirdly, those weren't the words that came out. Instead――
data.processed:
<story>I'm sure the old me would have asked something like that. 
<story>But weirdly, those weren't the words that came out. Instead――

data.text: Yeah! Rather than one person's, it's both of our Marvelous☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Yeah! Rather than one person's, it's both of our Marvelous☆

data.text:
And so we all head to the next town, 
waiting on the footpath for the festival floats to come.
data.processed:
<story>And so we all head to the next town, 
<story>waiting on the footpath for the festival floats to come.

data.text:
Ah……I think I hear something. 
I wonder if they're here now?
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Ah……I think I hear something. 
<story>I wonder if they're here now?

data.text: Waashoi! Waashoi!!
data.name: Float-bearers
data.processed: <story>Waashoi! Waashoi!!

data.text:
Ahahahaa! This is great! It's flashier than I imagined! 
This'll cause a buzz~!!
data.name: Uma Musume C
data.processed:
<story>Ahahahaa! This is great! It's flashier than I imagined! 
<story>This'll cause a buzz~!!

data.text:
It will! It's Marvelous! 
Marvelous☆ Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>It will! It's Marvelous! 
<story>Marvelous☆ Marvelous★

data.text:
After that, we followed the floats in high spirits, 
eventually arriving at the Summer Festival venue.
data.processed:
<story>After that, we followed the floats in high spirits, 
<story>eventually arriving at the Summer Festival venue.

data.text:
To think the floats would be that heavy! They let me 
try pulling it but, doing it by myself was pretty hard~.
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>To think the floats would be that heavy! They let me 
<story>try pulling it but, doing it by myself was pretty hard~.

data.text:
Being able to move it by yourself is Marvelous☆ 
Let's see if they'll let us all pull it together afterwards!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Being able to move it by yourself is Marvelous☆ 
<story>Let's see if they'll let us all pull it together afterwards!

data.text:
After this, sounds like they're going to do something 
with fireworks on them! Hand-held fireworks! I guess 
they're fireworks you carry in your hands or something~!
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>After this, sounds like they're going to do something 
<story>with fireworks on them! Hand-held fireworks! I guess 
<story>they're fireworks you carry in your hands or something~!

data.text:
Ooooh~ so there's fireworks like that! Being able to 
hold them in your hands, it sounds very Marvelous☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Ooooh~ so there's fireworks like that! Being able to 
<story>hold them in your hands, it sounds very Marvelous☆

data.text:
Ah, sounds like it's starting soon! 
Let's all go take a look!
data.name: Uma Musume C
data.processed:
<story>Ah, sounds like it's starting soon! 
<story>Let's all go take a look!

data.text:
Ahahahahaa! Everyone's Marvelous, huh☆ 
More than usual, much much more, a happy Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Ahahahahaa! Everyone's Marvelous, huh☆ 
<story>More than usual, much much more, a happy Marvelous★

data.text: As I thought, rather than with just one person, with two――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

choices.text: With two of us it's better――

data.processed: <story>As I thought, rather than with just one person, with two――

data.text: Marvelous☆★☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Marvelous☆★☆

data.text:
It was easy to make the world sparkle. Not alone, but together―― 
with just that……the world would become more Marvelous.
data.processed:
<story>It was easy to make the world sparkle. Not alone, but together―― 
<story>with just that……the world would become more Marvelous.

data.text:
In order to spread Marvelous around the world, 
I would continue to work together with her!
data.processed:
<story>In order to spread Marvelous around the world, 
<story>I would continue to work together with her!
